name: expandjs
description: This is a set of functions, designed to enhance your JavaScript programming experience.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.build: node bin/build && npm run build:browserify && npm run build:minify && node noconflict
scripts.build:minify: browserify -d bin --standalone XP -p [minifyify --map expandjs.min.map --output dist/expandjs.min.map] | derequire > dist/expandjs.min.js
